home.description: Your ultimate destination to connect with pet lovers and find the perfect companion.

about_us.validationError: All fields must be filled out and features cannot be empty.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.overviewDescription: Welcome to the Admin Dashboard. Manage your application, view statistics, and configure settings.
adminDashboard.manageContentDescription: Edit content, manage About Us and FAQs sections, and more.
adminDashboard.settingsDescription: Configure general settings and preferences for the application.
